column2: politics_scatterplot <- ggplot(merged_politics_df, aes(x = pre_mean_score, y = post_mean_score)) +
geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1, color = "darkseagreen", linetype = "dashed") +  # Line of equality +
geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = 0, ymax = pmin(pre_mean_score, post_mean_score)), fill = "gray", alpha = 0.3) +  # Shaded area
labs(x = "Pre-intervention mean rating", y = "Post-intervention mean rating", title = "Scatterplot of the change in subjects' opinions of the opposite party with a line of equality") +
